attributes.action: Youth, Care System, Mental health; immigrantion; our Prisons - 🇬🇧 need answers
attributes.additional_details: I want share my upset and frustration about the way our country seems to function. It often feels like we prioritise helping individuals from other countries while our own citizens, are left behind. It breaks my heart to see homeless veterans—individuals that have fought for their country being treated in this manner. Meanwhile, we support immigrants by providing them with accommodation, using taxpayer funds to give them food, clothing, and a sense of welcome. It raises so many questions ??
attributes.background: Your insights on these matters are essential for fostering positive change and addressing the needs of our community. These issues are very close to my heart, and I could really use your help in understanding the reasons behind the way our country operates.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
